title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\Builder\LimitFilter
name: LimitFilter
description: A builder used to configure limit based filters.

methods.name: cellsPerRow
methods.description: Matches only the first N cells of each row. If duplicate cells are present, as is possible when using an Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\InterleaveFilter, each copy of the cell is counted separately.

params.name: count
params.description: The number of cells to limit to.

methods.name: cellsPerColumn
methods.description: Matches only the most recent N cells within each column. For example, if count=2, this filter would match column foo:bar at timestamps 10 and 9 skip all earlier cells in foo:bar, and then begin matching again in column foo:bar2. If duplicate cells are present, as is possible when using an Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Filter\InterleaveFilter, each copy of the cell is counted separately.

params.name: count
params.description: The number of cells to limit to.
